page.title: 19HOLME LACY -PEOPLE'S LIVES 5
page.content: {Holme Lacy House}is just outside the village, but what happens there is {quite important to the villagers}as they will be affected by the{traffic and the{opportunities for work. Several of the older people had worked there when it was being used, some in the grounds and some indoors. None of them liked it being empty, and most had some{ideas about its future. Although some thought it might be turned into a{school}or{flats, a {hospital}or some sort of{leisure {place -}such as a{country club}or a {health farm}- many thought it would be bought by{someone rich. }Most thought it should be used usefully, as a{community home}or for the{good of {the people of the county,}with suggestions of a{youth hostel,}an{old {people's home,}a{hotel}or a{holiday {home.
